summary: The Cowboys are lured from Mexico to Coney Island by their former manager who disappeared at the end of Leningrad Cowboys Go America. He believes he is the reincarnation of Moses, sent to lead them back to the promised land - Siberia.
cast: Twist-Twist Erkinharju|Ben Granfelt|Sakke Järvenpää|Jore Marjaranta|Ekke Niiva|Jyri Närvänen|Pemo Ojala|Silu Seppälä|Mauri Sumén|Mato Valtonen|Matti Pellonpää|Kari Väänänen|André Wilms|Nicky Tesco|Jacques Blanc|Nicole Helies|Kirsi Tykkyläinen|Aki Kaurismäki
keywords: rock band|coney island|statue of liberty|brest france|warsaw poland
title: Leningrad Cowboys Meet Moses
